snippet.title: Hiatari Ryoukou! (陽あたり良好！) for the NEC PC-88
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

MSX2


Game description:

Hiatari Ryoukou! is a Japanese-style adventure based on the romance manga and anime bearing the same name.

The player is a high school student who just transferred. The player has to keep his social life intact, attend high school and, most importantly, find a girlfriend.
